question_content.description:
### Problem01

Consider the following TOY program.

```
10: 7101
11: 7207
12: 7301
13: 1333
14: 2221
15: D213
16: 0000
```

The value of R[3] is _____(0)\___ when the program halts. Note: Please type in decimal number.

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
